title: Marjayoun Governmental Hospital Upgrades
description: Rehabilitation of morgue, warehouse and oxygen systems (infrastructure renewal and service continuity).

title: RHUH Training Center Refit
description: Spatial reconfiguration, LV distribution upgrades and lighting modernization at Rafik Hariri University Hospital training center.

title: RHUH Shelter Construction
description: Construction of sand wall shelter (~250 m²) in RHUH basement 2 providing protected functional space.

title: Steel Hangars – Hamat Airbase Phase
description: New helicopter hangar structures and associated ancillary works (multi-phase).

title: Emile Helou Forensic Lab Renovation
description: Structural & fit-out renovation including mezzanine steel platform for police forensic laboratory modernization.

title: US Embassy Hotel Bathrooms Rehab
description: Comprehensive bathroom infrastructure and finish upgrades within secure compound facilities.

title: North Basketball Court Rehabilitation
description: Demolition and reconstruction of regulation-compliant basketball court (PRP program).

title: Hotel Monroe-Ain El Mraisseh
description: Controlled infection isolation ward construction (Sahet al Abed).
